title: Wild salmon and asparagus quiches
description: Perfect for large parties, this recipe is also easily halved for smaller gatherings.For this recipe you will need 18 x 10cm/4in round tartlet tins.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 free-range egg, beaten, for egg wash
large bowl ice cold water, for refreshing
